nodes.text: Progress was a painting available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War. The painting depicted a gear set into stone on the left side with streams of liquid metal on the right.

Progress appeared in Trials of Obi-Wan, a 2005 expansion pack for the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided. It could be used as decoration in the player's house. It was obtained by inserting three Force-infused items—a spool of wire, a recording rod, and a chance cube—into the Chu-Gon Dar cube, a Jedi relic capable of transmogrification through the Force. These items were looted from the corpses of the various enemies found on Mustafar. The schematic which was used to create it listed it as Mustafar Painting 3.
